channel.title: CVE Feed for deTheme -- DethemeKit For Elementor
channel.description: The latest CVEs for deTheme -- DethemeKit For Elementor

item.title: CVE-2024-5418|2024-05-31T02:41:08.761Z -- detheme -- DethemeKit For Elementor
item.description: The DethemeKit For Elementor plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the 'slitems' attribute within the plugin's De Product Tab & Slide widget in all versions up to, and including, 2.1.4 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping on user supplied attributes. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with contributor-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.

item.title: CVE-2024-34575|2024-05-17T06:03:34.050Z -- deTheme -- DethemeKit For Elementor
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in deTheme DethemeKit For Elementor allows Stored XSS.This issue affects DethemeKit For Elementor: from n/a through 2.1.2.

item.title: CVE-2024-32508|2024-04-17T09:53:06.098Z -- deTheme -- DethemeKit For Elementor
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in deTheme DethemeKit For Elementor allows Stored XSS.This issue affects DethemeKit For Elementor: from n/a through 2.0.2.

item.title: CVE-2024-4374|2024-05-18T04:30:51.945Z -- detheme -- DethemeKit For Elementor
item.description: The DethemeKit For Elementor plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the plugin's widgets in all versions up to, and including, 2.1.3 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping on user supplied attributes. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with contributor-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.
